participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is friendly and open-minded, enjoying sharing her interests with others.
participant_1.background: My favorite color is blue. I live in the usa. I was born male and transitioned to female when I was 17. I love pizza. I was born 20 years ago.

participant_2.name: Frank
participant_2.personality: Frank is adventurous and easy-going, always looking for new experiences and loves engaging in conversations.
participant_2.background: I spend the weekends travelling up to Canada to relax and enjoy the view. I hope to someday compete professionally or at least qualify for an event. My name is Frank. I'm the general manager of the local grocery store. My hobbies include reading and cycling.

content.text: Nice to meet you, Frank! What do you do for fun?
I like to read, cycle, and play video games.
Oh, that's cool! I like to read and play video games too.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of games, but I'm a big fan of RPGs.
Oh, me too! What are your favorite RPGs?
I like a lot of different RPGs, but some of my favorites are the Final Fantasy series, Mass Effect, and Elder Scrolls.
Those are all great games! I'm a big fan of the Final Fantasy series too.
What's your favorite Final Fantasy game?
It's hard to choose, but I think I'd have to say Final Fantasy VII.
That's a great choice! VII is my favorite too.
It's so good! I love the story, the characters, and the music.
Me too! It's such a classic game.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we could bond over Final Fantasy VII.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who's a fan of the same games.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we met.
